name: Alexander Fleming
contribution: Discovered penicillin and transformed infection treatment.

name: Louis Pasteur
contribution: Established germ theory and vaccination foundations.
relevance: Core to preventive infectious disease care.

name: Florence Nightingale
contribution: Standardized nursing and hygiene-centered hospital care.
relevance: Improved safety and quality in clinical systems.

name: Hippocrates
contribution: Advanced structured clinical observation and ethics.

name: Marie Curie
contribution: Pioneered radioactivity science for diagnosis and therapy.
relevance: Radiology and oncology rely on this groundwork.
